content: estuary is is a v-neck cardigan knit in pieces from the bottom up with two colors of berroco tuscan tweed place a darker shade on the bottom for a more flattering look shown in size 36 **finished measurements** bust closed - 32 36 40 44 48 52 length - 24½ 25 26 26 27 27½ note this garment was designed with approximately 2 4 ease please take this into consideration when selecting your size **yarn** berroco tuscan tweed 50 grs 5 5 6 6 7 8 balls #9022 cornflower mc and 2 3 3 4 4 4 balls #9003 iris cc **needles and notions** straight needles sizes 5 3 75 mm and 7 4 50 mm *or size to obtain gauge* 29 circular needle size 5 3 75 mm six 1 buttons **gauge** 18 sts and 26 row = 4 in st st on larger needles *to save time take time to check gauge*
